013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.utils.*;
016
017/**
018 * Represents a consumer of a single bean property value.
019 */
020public interface BeanPropertyConsumer extends Consumer4<BeanPropertyMeta,String,Object,Throwable> {}
